WorkItem.Description:
Hey ppl,
 
First of all thanks for all the great work, really appreciate it. I'm having a prob. When I copy paste the text from the in-game addon, the talents on my mage aren't set correctly. Am I doing something wrong or is it a prob on the string. In any case thx
 for the help and work you do.
 
 
 
Santeron (EU-Terenas-Alliance) ;)
WorkItem.Summary: Mage talents not being imported correctly via addon

Comments.Message: Can you attach the text you're pasting from in-game addon in a text file here?

Sure:

From what I see there is an extra "0" in the arcane tree and it doesn't get Arcane Explosion right in order to mess with everything else. If you see there are 22 chars for 21 talents.

I remember at one point there was an issue with the arcane talent supplying a ghost value for a defunct talent and it was an issue on Blizzards side. This was shortly before 4.0.6 came out that this came up if I remember correctly. I posted a bug on the bug forum but it appears that post has been deleted since.
If that's the case Hinalover this issue was to cover blizzards fault I guess... But now that blizzard fixed it, it looked like a bug :P

Had to do some searching but here is the original ticket we had on the issue:

http://rawr.codeplex.com/workitem/19622
It appears it's still as it was, that is not fixed on Blizzard side. Someone just removed the fix from the addon. I'll put it back in.
